abstract: Removes a match from Game Center that the local player participants in.
overview:
## Discussion

If you don’t use the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedMatchmakerViewController] interface, where players can delete their matches, use this method to delete a match that the local player no longer actively participants in. This method only removes the match from the local player’s Game Center data — it doesn’t impact other participants in the match.

# remove(completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Removes a match from Game Center that the local player participants in.

## Declaration

```swift
func remove(completionHandler: (((any Error)?) -> Void)? = nil)
```

```swift
func remove() async throws
```

## Parameters

- **completionHandler**: The block that GameKit calls when it completes the request.

The block receives the following parameter:



## Discussion

If you don’t use the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedMatchmakerViewController] interface, where players can delete their matches, use this method to delete a match that the local player no longer actively participants in. This method only removes the match from the local player’s Game Center data — it doesn’t impact other participants in the match.
title: remove(completionHandler:)
